items.title: UK Rejects Class A Status for Ketamine After Review
items.description: UK advisers say upgrading ketamine to Class A would not cut deaths or use, urging a ‘whole system’ public health response instead. Press Association

items.title: Saline Succeeds for Children With Sleep-Disordered Breathing
items.description: Intranasal saline is effective as a first-line treatment option before considering polysomnography or surgery. Medscape Medical News
